::Axis/Lokk::

Lokk struggles to control the ship as it speeds towards a continent 
of (North America) the planet. As they near the surface, Lokk pulls 
up, and the craft crashes into a high speed slide through some 
fields, skims over a lake, smashing into some trees, and losing 
anything that might have been sticking out until all that remained 
was a oval object rolling across the land. The approached a 
mountainous area, and the remains of the craft rolled up one large 
mountain, and stopped near the top when friction had become 
greater than forward force. A painfully obvious gash had been left 
along the ground leading to the small ship which carried three 
passengers. "Uhgngh..." a sound echoed out of the ship as a voice 
groaned in pain. Another voice joined it, "I think that we sur--" the 
sound is cut off as the voice of Axis flinches in pain, "--survived, 
Seekker, you ok?"
